text.section: The Commission shall establish a Real Estate Appraisal Hearing Board.

section.section: The Hearing Board shall consist of 3 members of the Commission, appointed by the Commission.

Of the 3 positions on the Real Estate Appraisal Hearing Board:
1 shall be a representative of a financial institution;
1 shall be a consumer member; and
1 shall be an appraiser with a level of licensure or certification at least equal to the individual subject to the disciplinary action.

text.section: From among the members of the Hearing Board, the Commission shall designate a chairman.
